Reference

All functions

EIRprev_beier1999

Measures of annual EIR and prevalence (Beier et al.,1999)

EIRprev_hay2005

Measures of annual EIR and prevalence within the same site

PCRMicro

Measures of prevalence by PCR and Microscopy

SIMPLEGEN

Simulating Plasmodium Epidemiological and Genetic Data

check_SIMPLEGEN_loaded()

Check that SIMPLEGEN package has loaded successfully

define_epi_params()

Define parameters of transmission simulation model

define_genetic_params()

Define genetic parameters

define_sampling_strategy()

Define how samples are taken from transmission model

get_coalescent_times()

Get coalescent time of two lineages

life_table_Mali()

A life table taken from Mali

plot_EIR_prevalence()

Plot EIR versus prevalence

plot_age_states()

Plot age distribution of states

plot_daily_states()

Plot daily counts of each host state

plot_epi_distribution()

Generic function for plotting a SIMPLEGEN flexible distribution

plot_treatment_seeking()

Plot distribution of treatment seeking in the population

prune_transmission_record()

Prune the transmission record

retrieve_prev()

Retrieve prevalence

sim_epi()

Simulate from simple individual-based model

sim_relatedness()

Draw tree of genome-wide relatedness from pruned transmission record

simplegen_file()

Load system file

simplegen_project()

Define new SIMPLEGEN project

study_data_2014

Details of data from Griffin et al 2014 refit
